greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle read by rows where T(n,k) is the number of unlabeled connected multigraphs with loops with n edges and k vertices.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1274
program: InvEulerMT(u)={my(n=#u, p=log(1+x*Ser(u)), vars=variables(p)); Vec(sum(i=1, n, moebius(i)*substvec(p + O(x*x^(n\i)), vars, apply(v->v^i,vars))/i) )}
permcount(v) = {my(m=1, s=0, k=0, t); for(i=1, #v, t=v[i]; k=if(i>1&&t==v[i-1], k+1, 1); m*=t*k; s+=t); s!/m}
xref: Row sums are A007719. Last column is A000055.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 26 2018
ext: Terms a(28) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Nov 30 2018
